recipe.title: Smoked-Bluefish Pâté
ingredients: 1/4 pound smoked bluefish or smoked trout, skin discarded and fish chopped
instructions: Stir together shallot, lemon juice, and 1/4 teaspoon salt, then beat in cream cheese, bluefish, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper with a spoon until combined well. Stir in chives.
